e="preserve">Peter Donat (born Pierre Collingwood Donat; January 20, 1928 – September 10, 2018) was a Canadian-American actor. He was born in Kentville, Nova Scotia. From 1965 to 1972, he was married to Michael Learned. Donat was known for his roles in ', "The X-Files", and in "The China Syndrome".
Donat died at his home in Point Reyes Station, California, on September 10, 2018, due to complications of diabetes, aged 90.
